name: Insect Apocolypse
description:
Thank you for playing my new game, Insect Apocolypse. If you like Plants vs Zombies and also love plastic army men, then this might be the game for you. It's silly, and fun, and just a little hardcore. 

I think it's best when played in full screen mode. Give it a try. 

I did all of the art and music myself. This is my first time animating and also processing sound FX. 

If you enjoy this game, please follow me on twitter for updates and info on other games @loststorygames

Now, go kill some bugs.
